experience.title: Platform Lead
experience.description: Building a VC Platform that helps founders beyond just funds, with a focus on two key pillars:1) Eximius Edge: Offering extensive support to our portfolio founders through initiatives such as hiring assistance, community building, strategic partnerships, and effective marketing strategies.2) Eximius Echo: Targeted marketing and growth efforts to elevate thought leadership, increase deal flow and strengthen brand presence.
